title._content: [Portrait of Erskine Butterfield, Brown Derby(?), Washington, D.C., ca. Mar. 1942] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Erskine Butterfield, Brown Derby(?), Washington, D.C., ca. Mar. 1942] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 046 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: The Washington Post, no. 24,027 (Mar. 29, 1942), p. VI, 9. Subjects: Butterfield, Erskine, 1913-1961 Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Pianists--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
